profile:
Save thousands by dealing directly with a manufacturer! Canadian Choice Windows and Doors Inc. is a leading manufacturer of windows in Canada, serving Ontario. Canadian Choice Windows and Doors offers a huge selection of replacement windows including energy efficient windows, vinyl windows, casement windows, awning windows and bow and bay windows.

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors has been serving Toronto, Richmond Hill, North York, Markham, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Kitchener, Cambridge, Niagra Falls and the surrounding areas as well as in Calgary, Edmonton, Winnipeg and Northern Ontario. 

Why is Canadian Choice Windows and Doors your best solution for window replacement?

1. No Pressure Estimate: take your time & make informed decision

2. Save Money: Energy Star windows will reduce your energy bill by 30 %

3. Professional Installation: flawless installation and thorough clean up by courteous installers

4. High Quality: The highest quality windows in the industry, featuring foam injected honey comb structure.
 
5. Easy Financing: Financing solutions to fit anyone’s lifestyle

6. Maximum Comfort: low-E coating to reflect summer sun and retain winter heat with our Cardinal Smart Glass system.

7. Zero Maintenance: our windows are easy to clean from within the home and will never fade or discolor

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors is your smartest solution for window and door replacement.

profile:
MARKELANGELO'S ROOFING serves the greater Ottawa area.  We are a professional and trustworthy company with a proven track record. We have fully trained, certified employees who specialize in specific installation procedures and focus 100% on quality control to ensure your satisfaction with the final product. 
 
As a testament to our exceptional level of service, our clients eagerly recommend us to friends and family. In fact, we built Markelangelo’s solely through word of mouth.

We are very aware of how our business impacts the environment. We contribute by participating in recycling programs available at local landfills. All garbage, shingles, metal and wood are separated before we take our dump trailers to these landfills. Each waste product is then put into its appropriate area of the landfill and processed. We save approximately a thousand tonnes of material being buried in landfills every year.

profile:
For 35 years and counting, Tropical Insulation Inc., has been the best choice for blown in, loose fill cellulose insulation installations across Toronto, the GTA and Southern Ontario. Whether you are a Homeowner involved in remodeling, renovating or retrofitting your home, or an Industry Professional or Contractor looking for a reputable insulation contractor for your next project, we can deliver reliable and prompt service at a competitive price, using only the highest quality Canadian-manufactured cellulose insulation on the market today. 
With the cost of living skyrocketing, saving money by saving energy has never been more important. Heating and cooling costs can account for 50-70% of a home or building’s yearly energy expense. When installed correctly, insulation is the simplest and most cost-effective means to lower this energy use. Remember, sealing and ventilating your home correctly will not only keep you warm in winter but will also cool you down in the summer months… Insulation is the perfect four season solution to saving you money.
If you are working on a “Green Building” project, or consider environmental sustainability a factor in your decision-making when selecting an insulation installer, please contact us. We choose to install Climatizer Plus™ cellulose insulation for its superior thermal and acoustical performance as well as its environmental benefits. Climatizer Plus loose-fill cellulose is certified by UL’s ECOLOGO program; indicating that this product has undergone rigorous scientific testing, auditing, or both, to prove its compliance with stringent, third party, environmental performance standards and may help you contribute to LEED credit categories.   
Call us or “Get started today” on our website and allow us to provide you the information you need to make an informed choice for your home or building insulation needs.  We offer free in-home assessments and quotes.

profile:
Tennant Home Service is Ottawa's top choice in thermal resistance for Attics. Put a Canadian
Touque on it! Comprised of an expert workforce who delivers reliable, thorough and an honest assessment of
your insulation needs.
***
With a long history of experience, we recognize homes built 1983 and onward in the Ottawa
area have insulation settling, rendering them well below the Recommended Maximum Energy
Efficiency Level of R60 or 22.25 inches.
****
Give your home the gift of warmth this year, put a Canadian touque on it, insulate your Attic
and your wallet!
products:
Tennant Home Service uses high end, Owens Corning propink blown fibreglass insulation,
bringing homes up to code to minimize cost to the consumer and maximizing the benefits of
retained thermal energy.
***
Propink … (benefits)
- has exceptional thermal resistance
- does not retain water and is hydrophobic
- minimizes the risk of mold
- has a 2% settling rate
- green and environmentally responsible
- negates VOC’s (volatile organic compounds)

With over 50 years of combined experience in Ottawa’s construction industry, the Panda Insulation team provides fast, friendly, and fully guaranteed service.

Our mission is to help Ottawa homeowners improve their energy efficiency and reduce their carbon footprint. A properly insulated attic will improve the energy efficiency of your home, extend the lifespan of your roof, and take stress off high-consumption heating and cooling systems.

profile:
Removing your old insulation is just as important as installing new insulation. 

Removing your old insulation improves Air Quality in your home, prevents mould & mildew buildup and improves the heating/cooling efficiency of your home.

www.alphaelite.ca/insulation-removal
CALL US TODAY

profile:
COVID 19 UPDATE:  We are open for business during this time and here to assist you with all of your project needs. We are following all of the health and safety guidelines as directed by the Province of Ontario and if coming onsite will be practicing social distancing to ensure the safety of our technicians and our customers. All of our technicians are checked each day Contact us today to schedule an appointment or consultation. 



RPM is a contract sales organization founded with the mission to combine best practices in Client contact, Training, Management and Quality Assurance into a complete service platform that consistently delivers exceptional results for our clients. RPM’s mission is to form long lasting relationships with each of our customers so we can grow our brand and provide continuous value. RPM is committed to treating your home like our own. We will take care of the things you don’t want to, or can’t, do. Our leadership team has a combined 60+ years of experience

****

Our Services:

****

Attic Insulation, Mold Remediation, Mold Prevention, Heating/Cooling, Exterior Window Cleaning, Gutter Cleaning and Gutter Guard Installation.

*****
Is your Furnace and/or AC on the Fritz? Is your equipment struggling to get the job done? RPM’s HVAC division provides and installs the best equipment with the best warranty in the business.

****

RPM’s Fibre Cellulose Insulation is a non-toxic natural product produced from 100% recycled papers helping reduce landfill waste and preserves natural resources.
Eco-Friendly Cellulose Insulation also requires a fraction of the energy to produce (as well as producing less carbon dioxide) than fiberglass. It also helps protect your home’s peace and quiet through its effective noise reduction capabilities and keep your home comfortable year round by limiting heat flow.

****

When was the last time you ventured into your attic? If you are like most home owners, its been a while! Attics typically are often forgotten about until a roof leak occurs.
Since attics are often out of sight & out of mind, they easily become a breeding ground for mold. Believe it or not, attics are one of the most common places for mold growth in a home.

****

RPM’s team uses highly purified water to ensure your satisfaction with our window cleaning services in North America. No cleaning chemicals are required.
The latest innovations in pure water window cleaning come from pure water cleaning. Most water has tiny dissolved particles in it. Once the water dries on a surface, those particles become the spots you see left behind. Purified water is the key to leaving no spots or residue on windows.
The water-fed pole removes the environmental impact of chemicals by using pure water alone, while allowing operators to clean windows safely – and more quickly – from the ground. 
RPM uses the next generation of pure water-fed poles, systems, and accessories, taking our window cleaning business to new heights. RPM uses Northern Lite water-fed poles and brushes.
For the hard to get dirt we use the Tucker Hybrid brush with boar hair bristles.
